channel.title: I have one major problem and 2 questions
channel.description:
my problem is my server keeps crashing and i cant see what from because it spams this top to bottom in the runserver dos window...
[code] at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) at Player.postProcessing(Player.java:1062) [/code]
and my questions are these are random things taken from my run-server dos box what do the different client numbers mean and also the person using client 5 what does it mean when that comes up? does it mean they are attacking an npc?
[code] [client-2-killer12]: playerCommand: welcome [client-5-dragon whip]: npcIndex: 311 magicID: 12911 [client-1-demons back]: playerCommand: god [client-3-samybam]: playerCommand: pk gear [client-4-erk200]: playerCommand: noclip [/code][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 04:17:34 PM[/size][hr]so...ummm...anyone gunna help?

item.title: I have one major problem and 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @buzzman1992 buzzman1992
item.description:
@buzzman1992 wrote:

ok
i think that its someone trying to get on after the server is maxed out on players but thanks

Read full topic

item.title: I have one major problem and 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @the_noob the noob
item.description:
@the_noob wrote:

The commands in the dos box mean that the player is using the command thats after it… like that elk guy is using the command noclip etc. and to the first problem it might be that somethings happening on the server? i dont really know…

Read full topic
